doc.title: Down with the Kings
doc.plot: Bobby and Kasey await Tanvir, who finally decides to show. The three friends go to the basketball court and get their game on! Things fall apart when new players enter that gain Tanvir's attention. The story is infused with retrospective moments that describe Tanvir's dangerous and very desperate path, including his newfound friendship with the Hustler. Bobby and Kasey emerge as true friends in Tanvir's moment of need with the Client, showing both tough love and warm support. The story ends with a look into the choices the main characters face: Could Bobby give up on his friend Tanvir? Can Tanvir make changes in his risky lifestyle?
